definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

sentences.english: Her round and orderly, will never change their sorrows and joys.
sentences.chinese: 她的圆缺有序，绝不会因人的悲喜而改变。

definition: a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
the sun and moon/day and month/every day and every month/season/life and livelihood
lit. the Big Dipper 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1] has turned and the stars have moved/time flies/also written 斗轉星移|斗转星移[Dou3 zhuan3 xing1 yi2]
